nodes.text: Hound Seven was the callsign of the seventh member of Hound Squadron. During the skirmish at Jiruus, Chass na Chadic noted that after the Hellion's Dare became a dot on her scanner, she noted other blips—Hound Six and Hound Seven—and turned her A/SF-01 B-wing starfighter to arc after them.
Hound Seven appeared in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
